1.0.name: wordpress/gantry-buddypress
1.0.description: Gantry BuddyPress plugin adds the support for the BuddyPress 1.6 (or newer) to all Gantry powered themes. The only thing that user needs to do is to download and activate the plugin. Depending on the theme some styling fixes might need to be applied.
